artifacts.summary: Implementation summary for canonical_reachable_linear proof using compound-formula linearity trick

partial_progress.details: All 4 phases completed. Proof compiles without sorry. Full project build passes.

completion_data.completion_summary: Proved canonical_reachable_linear theorem (0 sorries) using compound-formula linearity trick with dual non-comparability witnesses. Key insight: using G(alpha) AND neg(beta) paired with G(beta) AND neg(alpha) ensures G-propagation through CanonicalR contradicts neg-formulas in all three linearity cases, avoiding the infinite regress that blocked single-witness approaches.
